msg_header: Plug your MIDI keyboard/piano and improve your skills hitting the correct notes.
msg_footer: Still in <1>beta</1>. Soon, we will add key signatures, ranking and other features... Feedback? <3>contact@trainingpiano.com</3>
msg_unsupported_1: Unfortunately, your browser does not support Web MIDI API. So, we can't access your MIDI device. But you can still use the virtual piano.
msg_unsupported_2: Actually, the connection with MIDI devices works in <1>Google Chrome</1> (> 43), <3>Edge</3> (> 79) and <5>Opera</5> (> 33). You can check the compatible browsers <7>here</7>.
piano_msg_unsupported: Unfortunately, your browser does not <1>support</1> access to midi devices, but you can use the virtual piano.
piano_msg_supported: You can connect a MIDI piano/keyboard or use the virtual piano.
